alert.note: Alert for Clark (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 05 at 6:59AM CDT until August 05 at 9:37PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Quad Cities IA IL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Fox River at Wayland affecting Clark County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fox River at Wayland. * WHEN...From this morning to late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Water affects agricultural land on the south bank. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 16.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 1.6 feet Saturday, August 19. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued by this afternoon.
